TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaSession extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Allows interaction with media controllers, volume keys, media buttons, and transport controls.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Active : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Get the current active state of this session. -or- Set if this session is currently active and ready to receive commands.
Docs.value: True if the session is active, false otherwise.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.MediaSessionFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.MediaSessionFlags FlagHandlesTransportControls = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.MediaSessionFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Set this flag on the session to indicate that it handles transport control commands through its Callback.

Docs.param: The name of the event to send

Docs.summary: Send a proprietary event to all MediaControllers listening to this Session.

Docs.summary: Retrieve a token object that can be used by apps to create a MediaController for interacting with this session.
